snippet.title: Inertial Drift: Twilight Rivals Edition - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Pre-Order Now: https://pqube.co.uk/inertial-drift/
Coming to PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X on 20th October 2022

Set in a '90s retro future, ‘Inertial Drift: Twilight Rivals Edition’ is an arcade racer that tears up the racing rule book with innovative twin-stick control and completely reimagined driving mechanics, now coming to current generation consoles and packed with brand new content.

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
